questions.question: What is data visualization in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Data visualization in Power BI involves the graphical representation of data, enabling users to understand complex data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of charts in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Charts in Power BI visually represent data, providing insights and analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of dashboards in Power BI?

options.A: To provide a comprehensive view of data.

questions.explanation: Dashboards in Power BI provide a comprehensive view of data, enabling users to monitor and analyze data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of reports in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Reports in Power BI present data insights, providing a detailed view of data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of slicers in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Slicers in Power BI filter data in visualizations, allowing users to focus on specific data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of bookmarks in Power BI?

options.A: To save specific views of reports.

questions.explanation: Bookmarks in Power BI save specific views of reports, enabling users to quickly access important data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of themes in Power BI?

options.A: To customize the appearance of reports.

questions.explanation: Themes in Power BI customize the appearance of reports, providing a consistent and professional look.

questions.question: What is the purpose of data labels in Power BI?

options.A: To provide additional information in visualizations.

questions.explanation: Data labels in Power BI provide additional information in visualizations, enhancing data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of tooltips in Power BI?

options.A: To provide detailed information on data points.

questions.explanation: Tooltips in Power BI provide detailed information on data points, enhancing data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of drillthrough in Power BI?

options.A: To navigate to detailed reports from visualizations.

questions.explanation: Drillthrough in Power BI navigates to detailed reports from visualizations, providing deeper data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of cross-filtering in Power BI?

options.A: To filter data across multiple visualizations.

questions.explanation: Cross-filtering in Power BI filters data across multiple visualizations, providing comprehensive data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of visual interactions in Power BI?

options.A: To define how visualizations interact with each other.

questions.explanation: Visual interactions in Power BI define how visualizations interact with each other, enhancing data exploration.

questions.question: What is the purpose of custom visuals in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Custom visuals in Power BI extend visualization capabilities, providing unique data insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of KPI visuals in Power BI?
questions.explanation: KPI visuals in Power BI track key performance indicators, providing insights into business performance.

questions.question: What is the purpose of map visuals in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Map visuals in Power BI visualize geographical data, providing spatial insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of matrix visuals in Power BI?

options.A: To display data in a tabular format.

questions.explanation: Matrix visuals in Power BI display data in a tabular format, providing detailed data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of table visuals in Power BI?

options.A: To present data in rows and columns.

questions.explanation: Table visuals in Power BI present data in rows and columns, providing a structured view of data.

questions.question: What is the purpose of card visuals in Power BI?
questions.explanation: Card visuals in Power BI display single data points, providing quick insights into key metrics.

questions.question: What is the purpose of gauge visuals in Power BI?

options.A: To visualize progress towards a target.

questions.explanation: Gauge visuals in Power BI visualize progress towards a target, providing insights into performance metrics.
